content: はじめまして。私は田中です。よろしく_______。
answer_explanation: This is a standard greeting formula when meeting someone for the first time

suggestion: Look at the image and choose

content: 図書館は9時_______5時までです。
answer_explanation: Use 'kara' to indicate starting point of time
Use 'made' to indicate destination or endpoint

content: いっしょに映画を_______ませんか。
answer_explanation: Use 'mi' from 'miru' (to watch) for inviting to watch movies

content: コンサートは_______でしたか。
answer_explanation: Standard way to ask for opinion about events
Polite way to ask for something in a shop
Asking about how the festival was
Polite way to ask for separate bills
